description: This is a JavaScript source file using React to render the main application component into the DOM; it sets up the application root and renders the <App /> component within a StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React component tree into a specific DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root, initiating React's rendering process.
